Loving that IVA, Porkjet

Love the centrifuge iva porkjet. Hows the work on that bigger centrifuge coming along. I am currently using a scaled up small centrifuge for now but it looks a bit funny(especially the hatch). I would love for the 2.5m version of the centrifuge to have a bigger scaled inflated ring in comparison to the 1m one.

EDIT:

how about adding some puke on the walls and floor of that centrifuge iva?(just joking, dont do that:-P)

Edited December 23, 2013 by landeTLS

*tease*

http://i.imgur.com/qgirtyB.jpg

It's sad that we will not be able to move around in that centrifuge, I really want someone to make a mod that lets you move your Kerbals around the interior in IVA.
I've added a bunch of clickable view focus points, like those on windows on other cockpits throughout the whole Interior, this is as close as I can get it to walking around.

*tease*

http://i.imgur.com/qgirtyB.jpg

This

looks

epic

Update Download

Warning: Please delete the previous "PJ Hab Module" folder, as I've renamed it, your previous crafts will not load because of this, so evacuate your Kerbals and finish your missions before you update.

What I've done:

- finished centrifuge internals

- resized centrifuges hatch section because when exiting the hatch, my kerbals kept shooting into my crafts causing Gravity-like events.

- Overhaul of Orbital Orb (OoOO:confused:) - is now a command pod, slightly heavier, holds 50 monopropellant but has no reaction wheels, texture improved, window light animation added. IVA not made yet, changed placeholder IVA to Landercan

- made animations slower, centrifuge now rotates at realistic speed (10rpm)

I'm gonna make a proper realease thread sometime soon, but first I'll consume lots of christmas goose and eggnog.

Merry Christmas to you all.

The centrifuge IVA is simply incredible Porkjet!

Have a fantastic Christmas

Update Download

Warning: Please delete the previous "PJ Hab Module" folder, as I've renamed it, your previous crafts will not load because of this, so evacuate your Kerbals and finish your missions before you update.

What I've done:

- finished centrifuge internals

- resized centrifuges hatch section because when exiting the hatch, my kerbals kept shooting into my crafts causing Gravity-like events.

- Overhaul of Orbital Orb (OoOO:confused:) - is now a command pod, slightly heavier, holds 50 monopropellant but has no reaction wheels, texture improved, window light animation added. IVA not made yet, changed placeholder IVA to Landercan

- made animations slower, centrifuge now rotates at realistic speed (10rpm)

I'm gonna make a proper realease thread sometime soon, but first I'll consume lots of christmas goose and eggnog.

Merry Christmas to you all.

Best... christmas present... ever...
Yep that is a awesome christmas present

Aww. I wish I could give you a present back

Expect a large yellow spotted teapot in the mail!

This mod has so much potential! any chance this mod could end up being part of something like this? Would be one of the best mods if it ends up like this! Do continue this mod!:

Notice the bigelow stile inflatable hab module up front!

This mod has so much potential! any chance this mod could end up being part of something like this? Would be one of the best mods if it ends up like this! Do continue this mod!:

(see original for image)

Notice the bigelow stile inflatable hab module up front!

That will happen. I've already done those rings at the ends of trusses and they are dockable to allow the ship to be sent up in sections. (Copernicus would have required three launches not counting the habitats and return stage) Now I have to texture it and make the truss parts.
awesome job, then!

This mod has so much potential! any chance this mod could end up being part of something like this? Would be one of the best mods if it ends up like this! Do continue this mod!:

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4c/Orion_docked_to_Mars_Transfer_Vehicle.jpg

Notice the bigelow stile inflatable hab module up front!

Hell yea, would love to make this.

Love the update! Especially enjoy the more leisurely rotation, its really a beautiful model. And I was so excited to see you can "walk" through the IVA with the different viewpoints! (The Inflato module is great in and out, too, used it to build a big honking space station.)

A couple little things I noticed:

1. The centrifuge GUI options get a little screwy after the initial Inflate/Rotate. It will only display "deflate" or "stop", not usually both, and it wont necessarily do the one you tell it to. Not a huge issue, it's easy to mess with it till you get it in the state you want.

2. From the IVA in the centrifuge, you can see a bit of the strut structure through the "roof" (The innermost edge of the centrifuge).

Nothing game breaking, just little things. Thanks so much for this awesome mod!
That is one nice mod you made. Lovin' it.

This mod has so much potential! any chance this mod could end up being part of something like this? Would be one of the best mods if it ends up like this! Do continue this mod!:
